entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. A few flurries beginning this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
